dining-area.title: the dining room
dining-area.body: a long table is set up in the center of the room, surrounded by benches. it looks like this was once used for eating, but the only thing on it now is dust.

kitchen.title: a kitchen
kitchen.body: the kitchen is in disarray, with empty cans, broken glass and cooking utensils covering the floor.

main.title: an old structure
main.body: a small structure juts out of the ashen wasteland; the windows are all destroyed. a broken sign lays next to the entrance, too faded to be read.
